name: Ben Jordan: Paranormal Investigator Case 2 - The Lost Galleon of the Salton Sea
name_original: Ben Jordan: Paranormal Investigator Case 2 - The Lost Galleon of the Salton Sea
description:
Ben is called out to the tiny desert town of Dunesberg, California, to investigate

the disappearance of a local man who went out searching for the Lost Galleon,
a Spanish treasure ship said to be located somewhere beneath the sands.
